text: Manganese(II) fluoride is a chemical compound. Its chemical formula is MnF2. It is made by reacting manganese(II) carbonate or manganese(II) oxide with hydrofluoric acid. It is used to make other manganese fluorides. It is also used in lasers. It is much less reactive than the other manganese fluorides. ==Related pages== *Manganese(II) chloride *Manganese(II) sulfate *Manganese(IV) oxide ==Sources== Category:Manganese compounds Category:Fluorine compounds
title: Manganese(II) fluoride
